api/JeremyAnsel.DirectX.Window.MouseKeys.keywords: Enum MouseKeys Indicates whether various virtual keys are down. Namespace: JeremyAnsel.DirectX.Window Assembly: JeremyAnsel.DirectX.Window.dll Syntax [Flags] public enum MouseKeys Fields Name Description Control The CTRL key is down. LeftButton The left mouse button is down. MiddleButton The middle mouse button is down. RightButton The right mouse button is down. Shift The SHIFT key is down. XButton1 The first X button is down. XButton2 The second X button is down.
